title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: The obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) appear prominently in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) should have less prominence in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Open Type dialog.
2. Observe the prominence of the obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) in the dialog.
